physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Masked facies, drugged appearance, fine tremor, parkinsonian gait, vegetative signs of depression.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient's vegetative signs of depression worsened during hospitalization; abnormal orofacial movements developed and persisted until mid-February before ceasing.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severely depressed with orofacial movements characterized by darting tongue movements, lip-pursing, chin quivering, and bucco-mandibular masticatory movements.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Orofacial movements persisted; EEG showed improvement but affect and movement disorder were unchanged.
The abnormal movements returned before going home, but remitted rapidly with psychotherapeutic review.
